title: MR.SIGA Mini Dustpan and Brush Sets, Dust Pan and Brush Bamboo Handle, Durable Bristles and Easy-Sweep Blade, Lightweight Design, Grey
features: Elegant and compact design: MR.SIGA dustpan and brush sets has a natural bamboo handle, its portable design makes it easy to carry and store, the brush and pan set ideal for quick clean-ups anywhere in the home or office. Measures 18centimetres X 15.7centimetres(7.1 inch x 6.2 inch)

Brush is made of dense and durable bristles, it won't scratch cleaning surface. Soft rubber lip lies flat against cleaning surface and allows for maximum pickup, while built-in raised bar makes debris not easy to fall
Use this mini dustpan and brush in kitchen, office, bathroom, garage and it helps tackle the messes effectively. Handle snaps into dustpan and features a loop for hanging storage

This all purpose sweeping brush is your great household assistant, ideal for cleaning debris from couch, furniture, countertop, the small dustpan and brush also works effectively on bed sheet, car interior or any surface that needs a helping hand
MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner, please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have, We will do our best to give you a satisfactory answer
description: Product Description MR.SIGA household dustpan set features a bamboo handle, soft bristles easily reaching corners and edges for efficient cleaning to solve your daily cleaning needs. Natural and Durable Materials The MR.SIGA mini dustpan and brush set features a bamboo handle, bringing a touch of nature to your cleaning routine, making it a reliable choice for regular cleaning tasks around the house, office, or even in your car. Portable and Compact Design This portable cleaning brush and dustpan combo is designed with convenience in mind. Its mini size makes it easy to carry around, whether you're traveling, camping, or simply need to clean up small messes at your home. Efficient Cleaning Performance The dustpan's edge is designed to fit snugly against floors and surfaces, preventing any debris from slipping under or escaping during the cleaning process, providing you with a thorough clean every time. Versatile Cleaning Companion This dustpan and brush combo is suitable for various surfaces, including hardwood floors, tiles, carpets, and even countertops. Whether you're cleaning up after a snack, tidying up a workspace, or dealing with pet hair, the set is up to the task, making it a versatile addition to your cleaning job. Why is the MR.SIGA mini dustpan and brush set ideal for small spaces? The mini dustpan and brush set are compact and lightweight, making it ideal for small spaces like kitchens, bathrooms, and offices. Its small size allows for quick, efficient cleanups without taking up much room. Will this dustpan pick up all the dust? Yes, the soft rubber lip ensures a tight seal against surfaces, picking up every last speck of dust while the built-in raised bar prevents debris from falling. What are the benefits of bamboo handles? The ergonomic bamboo handle is both durable and comfortable, making it a practical and stylish choice for your cleaning needs. Will the bristles on the brush scratch cleaning surfaces? No, the MR.SIGA brush is made of dense and durable bristles that are soft enough to clean without scratching any delicate surfaces, ensuring safe and effective cleaning. How is the brush stored when not in use? The handle of the brush snaps into the dustpan, and a hanging loop is included for easy access and space-saving organization.
